entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 40%
